title: I can't apply for PBE?
body: I applied back then but, that was back in season 6. I can't apply now. It says that something error page not found?

replies.body: Thanks Lew!  The site is indeed down, and will be [until further notice.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Q8vGhigp-442017-pbe-signup-site-issues)  I have no eta on when it will be back up, but be sure to check the status page regularly for updates.  I hope that helps!
The PBE website is down for [maintenance](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).
